Package net.ssehub.comani.extraction

Class ExtractionManager

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
net.ssehub.comani.core.AbstractManager
net.ssehub.comani.extraction.ExtractionManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ExtractionManager
extends AbstractManager
This class manages the entire commit extraction process.
Author:
Christian Kroeher

  • Constructor Details

    • ExtractionManager

      public ExtractionManager​(java.lang.String operatingSystem, java.lang.String versionControlSystem, java.util.Properties extractionProperties, CommitQueue commitQueue, java.lang.String commit)
      Constructs the extraction manager.
      Parameters:
      operatingSystem - the name of the operating system on which the tool is currently executed
      versionControlSystem - the name of the version control system from which the commits shall be extracted
      extractionProperties - the properties of the properties file defining the extraction process and the configuration of the extractor in use; all properties, which start with the prefix "extraction."
      commitQueue - the CommitQueue for sending extracted commits to an analyzer
      commit - the content of a single commit, which shall be extracted to an internal Commit for analysis; can be null

  • Method Details

    • setup

      protected boolean setup()
      Performs the necessary setup and configuration of this manager before it is ready to AbstractManager.run().
      Specified by:
      setup in class AbstractManager
      Returns:
      true this manager is ready for execution; false otherwise

    • go

      protected boolean go()
      Starts the extraction or analysis process using the properties given during construction of this object. Note that method is only called if AbstractManager.setup() returned true.
      Specified by:
      go in class AbstractManager
      Returns:
      true if the extraction or analysis process was successful; false otherwise
